title: NFL ATL: Week 7 preview, TNF recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 7 preview, TNF recap
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling gear up to give you a full Week 7 preview and recap all of the action from the “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the Seattle Seahawks and Arizona Cardinals. You won’t want to miss the gang’s bold hero picks this week. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
